S.FORM: Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa 1 bulad 28 demiad, Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, u misingkiway. 1950 a mihca nalecuhan u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung nu Bahrain ayza sa ci Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, micakat a demiad sa i 1999 a mihca 3 bulad 6 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
